import rhinoscriptsyntax as rs

def MakePlanarSrfFromCrvs():
    crvs=rs.GetObjects("Select some curves",4)
    if not crvs: return
    srf=rs.AddPlanarSrf(crvs)
    if srf:
        rs.SelectObject(srf)
MakePlanarSrfFromCrvs()
